‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂∫‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ö ..‡∂î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∂Ç ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂Ü‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂©‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂â‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß‡∑É‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä…the sigma blog ‡∂Ö‡∂©‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑í‡∂´‡∑í ‡∂î‡∂∫‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑ù‡∂∏ ‡∑É‡∑è‡∂Ø‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è.. ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂©‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂Ø‡∑ì ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂Ø GUI ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∑É‡∑Ñ ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø. GUI ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è…‡∂í ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∂≠‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è..‡∂∏‡∂≠‡∂ö ‡∂±‡∑ë ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂©‡∂∏‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù..

‡∂Ö‡∂Ø ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂©‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂Ø‡∑ì ‡∑É‡∑è‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∑ä window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß graphical element add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö….‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂∏ ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂ö‡∑ù…‡∂≠‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß title ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂ö‡∑ù…‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂†‡∑ä‡∂†‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è setTitle() ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± method ‡∂ë‡∂ö….argument ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑í title ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä…code ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù…

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");
       }
}

Output…

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í title ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä set ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑è..‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î label ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è..

Label ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂ª window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂¥‡∑î ‡∂Ø‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í…‡∂í ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑Ä‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑ö…window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂± ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂Æ‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑ö JFrame ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä predefine ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∂‡∑î‡∂± class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂¥‡∑î ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂±‡∑ö…‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∂Ø‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂í ‡∂Ø‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í..JLabel ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä define ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è …‡∂Ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂í class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö…JFrame , JLabel ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∂ª‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ô‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∑í JPanel,JMenu, JButton,JTextArea,JTextField ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö class ‡∂ú‡∑ú‡∂©‡∂ö‡∑ä predefine ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂ª ‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂∏ import ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± package ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ö…‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑Å‡∑ä‡∂∫ graphical element ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑í…‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ω‡∑ö‡∑É‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂±‡∑ö‡∂ØüòÉüòÉ….

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel lebel1=new JLabel();
		
       }
}

‡∂î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂î‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í label ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö…label ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ö‡∂Ç ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂ß ‡∑Ä‡∑ê‡∂©‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ë‡∂±‡∑ö…‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ö…‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂†‡∑ä‡∂†‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è add ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± keyword ‡∂ë‡∂ö.

‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠ label ‡∂ë‡∂ö add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∑è‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂ª‡∑ú‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑î ‡∑Ä‡∂± ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂Æ‡∑è‡∂±‡∂∫‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑í ‡∑Ä‡∂ª‡∑Ñ‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ö…North, South, East , West ‡∑Ñ‡∑è Center ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂Æ‡∑è‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è…labels,buttons,textFields .. ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö ‡∂í‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑è‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä..

‡∂î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂î‡∂∫ ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂Æ‡∑è‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂ß‡∂∏ button ‡∂ë‡∂ö add ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑è‡∂∏ ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö…

‡∂≠‡∑Ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ...graphical element ‡∂ë‡∂ö add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑í ‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂Æ‡∑è‡∂±‡∂∫ ‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂Ø‡∑ä‡∂Ø‡∑ì ‡∂¥‡∂Ω‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂ª upper case ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑í…

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel label1=new JLabel("This is a Lebel !");
		
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",label1);
		
       }
}

output ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù…

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í label ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∑è…‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑î ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è..‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í Jpanel ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂Ω‡∑è add keyword ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂†‡∑ä‡∂†‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö…

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel label1=new JLabel("This is a Lebel !");
		
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",label1);

		JPanel panel1=new JPanel();
	
		MyJavaFrame.add(panel1);	
       }
}

output ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù…

‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑É‡∑í ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂±‡∑ë ‡∂±‡∑ö‡∂Ø…‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂ß‡∂∏ panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö..window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂ß‡∂∫‡∑í panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂ß‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂± ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂¥‡∑ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑ö… ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂ß ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù….

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel label1=new JLabel("This is a Lebel !");
		
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",label1);

		JPanel panel1=new JPanel();

		panel1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);

		MyJavaFrame.add(panel1);	
       }
}

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ù output ‡∂ë‡∂ö …

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂¥‡∑ö‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂±‡∑ö‡∂Ø..‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑è…‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î Text field ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂∫‡∑í text area ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è…‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ JtextField ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∑í , JtextArea ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∑í object ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö…‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö object ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß constructor ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ö coloms ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∂±‡∂∫‡∑í rows ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∂±‡∂∫‡∑í pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö..

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel label1=new JLabel("This is a Lebel !");
		
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",label1);
		JPanel panel1=new JPanel();

		panel1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);

		MyJavaFrame.add(panel1);

		JTextField textField1=new JTextField();

		JTextArea textArea1=new JTextArea(5,5);	
	
		
       }
}

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂î‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏ ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠ text field ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂∫‡∑í text area ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß ‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑ä‡∂¥‡∂±‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è…‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂ö‡∂Ø ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂Ø…‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂Ω‡∑è window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂¥‡∑î ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂± elements window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑è‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂±‡∑ë…‡∂Ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂≠‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä elements add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö panel ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß…

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JLabel label1=new JLabel("This is a Lebel !");
		
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",label1);
		JPanel panel1=new JPanel();

		panel1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);

		MyJavaFrame.add(panel1);

		JTextField textField1=new JTextField();

		JTextArea textArea1=new JTextArea(5,5);	
	
		panel1.add("North",textField1);
		panel1.add("South",textArea1);
		MyJavaFrame.add(panel1);
       }
}

‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑ä‡∂Ω‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ë ‡∂±‡∑ö‡∂Ø..‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î button ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è…‡∂Ω‡∑ú‡∂ö‡∑î ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ë…JButton ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± class ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö…button ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑Å‡∂∫ ‡∂±‡∂∏ constractor ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä…‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö window ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß button ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è North ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± position ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß…

import java.awt.*;
import javax.swing.*;

class Gui extends JFrame{
	public static void main(String args[]){
		JFrame MyJavaFrame=new JFrame();
		MyJavaFrame.setVisible(true);
		MyJavaFrame.setSize(300,300);
		MyJavaFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
		MyJavaFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		MyJavaFrame.setTitle("My first Java Frame !");

		JButton button=new JButton("Click me !");
		MyJavaFrame.add("North",button);
       }
}
